title: I shouldn't be put in low priority since it kept saying "attempting to reconnect".
body: When I was playing a match, I got in the game but it kept saying "attempting to reconnect". so i wait for a couple of minutes but I got impatient, so I quitted. But I didn't know i wasn't connected to wi-fi  anymore, so it shouldn't be my fault since I didn't notice last minute and that it would be my first guess that I wasn't connected.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, the reason for the disconnection doesn't impact the fact that your absence from the match **negatively affected** everyone in the match. This is a key reason as to why the system is designed to treat all disconnections equally and why we're unable to remove these penalties.

Check out our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more info on the system. Let me know if you have any questions.
